title: Suspected chlorine gas attack strikes near Damascus
text:
Suspected chlorine gas attack strikes near Damascus  21 
Several people suffered symptoms consistent with exposure to chlorine gas in the rebel-held eastern Ghouta district near Damascus on Sunday, and one child was killed, the health authorities in the opposition-held area said in a statement.   
Several people suffered symptoms consistent with exposure to chlorine gas in the rebel-held eastern Ghouta district near Damascus on Sunday, and one child was killed, the health authorities in the opposition-held area said in a statement.  //reut.rs/2EUln3j
